data.title: Transportation Services University of Maryland
data.text:
SYSTEM UPDATES & ALERTS

Summer to Fall Intersemester Shuttle-UM Service Update: Sunday, Aug. 18–Friday, Aug. 23

109: Regular service on 109 River Road resumes on Monday, August 5

Fall 2024 Schedules are posted below.

The 127 Mazza GrandMarc route will not operate this fall, as the management of Mazza GrandMarc opted not to renew Shuttle-UM service.

The 128 The Nine Route has been adjusted to served the areas that were previously a part of the 127 Mazza GrandMarc line.

Shuttle-UM's real-time bus arrival information is live on the Transit app.

SUMMER SCHEDULES

104 COLLEGE PARK METRO - SUMMER

(detour on 8/5 & 8/6 evenings, see above for details)109 RIVER ROAD - SUMMER (effective 8/5)109 RIVER ROAD - SUMMER DETOUR (effective 6/13–8/2)

FALL SCHEDULES

104 COLLEGE PARK METRO/DISCOVERY DISTRICT105 CAMPUS CONNECTOR108 ADELPHI111 SILVER SPRING113 HYATTSVILLE114 UNIVERSITY VIEW115 ORANGE116 PURPLE117 BLUE118 GOLD122 GREEN126 NEW CARROLLTON128 THE NINE129 TEMPO132 THE VARSITY133 GROCERY SHOPPING SHUTTLE141 GAITHERSBURG PARK & RIDE142 COLUMBIA PARK & RIDE143 GREENBELT

DOWNLOAD TRANSIT APP

Transit is the official app of Shuttle-UM. Transit provides real-time bus arrival information, alerts and notifications for Shuttle-UM routes. Find your commute by using the multimodal trip planning tool.

JOIN OUR TEAM: NOW HIRING STUDENT DRIVERS

When you join our team, you’re joining a community. These jobs are flexible, fun and equip you with skills that will last beyond graduation. Retention scholarships available.

Transit drivers: $16.50/hour during commercial driver’s license (CDL) training, $18.50/hour when licensed. See full job description.

COLLEGE PARK RESIDENT PASS INFO

Complimentary Shuttle-UM bus passes are available to City of College Park residents. Passes may be obtained from City Hall, Davis Hall and Youth and Family Services.

FREE RIDERSHIP ON MARYLAND TRANSIT ADMINISTRATION’S (MTA) SYSTEMS
